activities: Blue Ocean Enterprises, Inc. receives personal information from individuals in the European Union and Switzerland to provide requested information and information regarding future products, services, or opportunities. We receive customer information collected by our clients and entities owned or operated by Blue Ocean Enterprises, Inc.  to provide business services to these companies, including legal, marketing, information technology, financial, and real estate management services. Blue Ocean Enterprises, Inc. receives Employee personal data from the European Union and Switzerland for global recruitment functions, human resources management and administration, and to provide benefits.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online, off-line, and manually processed data, and human resource data
